CASSAVA: I am more certain than ever of my hypothesis.
2 1
CASSAVA: This structure appears meticulously constructed, and its payload devastating to the entire star system..
3 2
CASSAVA: Yet, this danger appears completely inert to select lifeforms. The trees of <color=lightblue>Timber Hearth,</color> and this lone plant left by the expedition team, have been completely untouched by its presence.
4 3
CASSAVA: Even if this suspicious detail had not betrayed the nature of the structure's source, I am more certain than ever that this comet did not arrive in our star system by coincidence.
5 4
CASSAVA: I vow to locate this source... and repay the knowledge they have so kindly taught us.
6 4
CASSAVA: Poke, Pye, Clary... I thank you for your undying curiosity, and your brave sacrifices. I will ensure that they were not in vain.
